article: Lucy and Jim live in China. They  _  friends. They are  _  the same school. They have lessons from Monday to Friday. They  _  to school together in the morning. They have four classes in the morning and two in the  _  . They have lunch at school. After school, Lucy goes  _  and does her homework,  _  Jim stays at school. He plays basketball with his classmates. On Saturday Jim plays computer games at home but Lucy has to go to her  _  lessons in a music club. On  _  Jim stays at home and watches TV. Lucy has to learn to play  _  piano. Lucy is so busy. She has little time  to play  . How she envies Jim!
